footer.companyDesc: We create modern premium-class projects that meet high standards of quality and comfort.

about.title: ABOUT THE COMPANY
about.subtitle: TOWER UP is a modern construction company specializing in the construction of premium-class residential complexes and commercial real estate.
about.text1: Our company has many years of experience in construction and implementation of large-scale projects.
about.text2: We create real estate that meets the highest requirements for comfort and quality.

quality.title: High Quality
quality.desc: We use only certified materials and modern construction technologies

design.title: Unique Design
design.desc: Each of our projects features modern architecture and thoughtful design

location.title: Excellent Location
location.desc: Our properties are located in promising and convenient areas of the city

infrastructure.title: Developed Infrastructure
infrastructure.desc: Everything necessary for a comfortable life is within walking distance

projects.title: OUR PROJECTS
projects.subtitle: We build premium-class residential complexes and commercial real estate

news.title: NEWS AND VACANCIES
news.subtitle: Current information about our company and open vacancies

partners.title: OUR PARTNERS
partners.subtitle: We cooperate with leading companies and suppliers

contact.title: CONTACT US
contact.subtitle: Do you have any questions? Fill out the form below, and we will contact you shortly
contact.name: Your Name

map.title: Our Location
map.subtitle: We are located in the center of Tashkent and are always happy to see you in our office

quality.title: Quality
quality.desc: We strive for excellence in every aspect of our work

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.desc: We implement advanced technologies in construction

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.desc: We fulfill all obligations to customers and partners

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.desc: We are open and honest in all aspects of our activities

team.title: OUR TEAM
team.desc: Our team consists of experienced professionals dedicated to their work

history.title: OUR HISTORY
history.desc: History of TOWER UP company development

projects.title: CURRENT PROJECTS
projects.desc: Get acquainted with our current projects

services.title: Construction Services
services.desc1: Our company provides a full range of services for the construction of facilities for various purposes: residential complexes, commercial buildings, industrial facilities, and infrastructure.
services.desc2: We use modern construction technologies and quality materials, which allows us to create durable and functional facilities.

services.title: Design Services
services.desc1: We offer professional services for designing buildings and structures. Our team of experienced architects and engineers develops projects of varying complexity, taking into account all customer requirements and regulatory standards.
services.desc2: We use modern software to create detailed 3D models and project documentation, which allows visualizing the result before construction begins.

info.title: Our Contacts
info.addressValue: Tashkent city, Sergeli district, MSG Yangi Qumariq. Landmark: GM Motor factory.

team.title: About Our Team
team.desc1: The TOWER UP team consists of highly qualified professionals with many years of experience in construction, finance, and management. We are united by a common goal – to create unique facilities that beautify the urban landscape and make people's lives more comfortable.
team.desc2: Our management constantly monitors innovations in the industry, implements modern technologies and approaches to project management. Thanks to this, TOWER UP projects always feature high-quality execution, adherence to deadlines and budget.

careers.title: Join Our Team
careers.desc: TOWER UP offers unique opportunities for professional and career growth. We value initiative, creativity, and the desire for constant development.
careers.apply.desc1: Send your resume to hr@towerup.ru, indicating the position you are interested in in the subject line.
careers.apply.desc2: You can also familiarize yourself with current vacancies in the "Vacancies" section on our website.

news.title: NEWS
news.notFoundDesc: There are currently no news. Please check back later.

vacancies.title: VACANCIES
vacancies.notFoundDesc: There are currently no vacancies. Please check back later.

trcBochka.title: SEC "BOCHKA"
trcBochka.subtitle: Modern multifunctional shopping and entertainment center in Tashkent region
trcBochka.description: Shopping and Entertainment Center "Bochka" is a new project of TOWER UP company, located in Tashkent region. The project is a modern complex with unique architecture, including retail spaces, restaurants, cinema, and entertainment areas.

overview.title: PROJECT OVERVIEW
overview.desc: SEC "Bochka" combines modern architecture and functionality, offering visitors a wide range of shopping and entertainment opportunities in a comfortable atmosphere.

architecture.title: ARCHITECTURE
architecture.desc: The architecture of SEC "Bochka" features an original facade and interior design. The project is executed in a modern style using quality materials that ensure durability and aesthetic appeal of the building.

retail.title: Retail Gallery
retail.desc: More than 100 stores of various brands

food.title: Food Court and Restaurants
food.desc: Various world cuisines and leisure areas

entertainment.title: Entertainment Zone
entertainment.desc: Cinema, game zone for children and adults

contact.title: CONTACT US
contact.subtitle: Learn more about retail space rental opportunities

newUzbekistan.title: DISTRICT "NEW UZBEKISTAN"
newUzbekistan.subtitle: Large-scale residential complex with modern infrastructure

hero.title: NEW UZBEKISTAN
hero.subtitle: A modern district for a comfortable life
hero.description: District "New Uzbekistan" is an ambitious project by TOWER UP, representing a new standard of urban living in harmony with nature

overview.title: PROJECT OVERVIEW
overview.subtitle: A new standard of comfort for Uzbekistan
overview.desc1: District "New Uzbekistan" is a large-scale residential complex that combines modern architecture, developed infrastructure, and environmental principles.
overview.desc2: The project includes residential buildings with various apartment layouts, commercial spaces, educational institutions, sports facilities, and recreational areas.
overview.desc3: The concept focuses on creating a comfortable living environment that meets international standards while preserving the national identity.

masterplan.title: MASTER PLAN
masterplan.subtitle: Thoughtfully designed urban space
masterplan.desc: The master plan of the district was developed with the participation of leading architects and urban planners, taking into account modern trends in urban development.

architecture.title: Modern Architecture
architecture.desc: Buildings designed in a contemporary style with national elements

greenery.title: Green Spaces
greenery.desc: Over 30% of the territory allocated for parks and gardens

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure
infrastructure.desc: Schools, kindergartens, clinics, and commercial areas

parking.title: Parking Solutions
parking.desc: Underground and ground-level parking throughout the district

security.title: Security
security.desc: 24/7 surveillance and restricted access to residential areas

recreation.title: Recreation Areas
recreation.desc: Playgrounds, sports fields, and walking paths

apartments.title: APARTMENTS
apartments.subtitle: Variety of layouts to suit different needs
apartments.desc: The residential buildings offer apartments ranging from compact studios to spacious multi-room units, all featuring efficient layouts and high-quality finishes.

studio.title: Studio Apartments
studio.desc: Compact and functional spaces for singles and young couples

oneBedroom.title: One-Bedroom Apartments
oneBedroom.desc: Balanced layouts with separate bedroom and living areas

premium.title: Premium Apartments
premium.desc: Exclusive layouts with premium finishes and panoramic views

apartments.floorLayoutDesc: Complete floor layout showing the arrangement of all apartment units in a single floor
apartments.footer: Floor plans are subject to availability. Contact our sales team for current pricing and availability of specific units.

aboutSection.title: ABOUT THE COMPANY
aboutSection.text: A leading construction company specializing in innovative projects and high-rise buildings. Since its foundation, the company has been striving to implement the most ambitious and complex architectural ideas, offering clients solutions at the highest level.

professionalism.title: PROFESSIONALISM
professionalism.desc: The foundation of our professionalism is preserving our own traditions and utilizing global innovations.

experience.title: COMPANY EXPERIENCE
experience.desc: We don't have to prove the quality of our products. Your recognition does it for us.

equipment.title: EQUIPMENT
equipment.desc: The technological superiority of our equipment is a distinguishing element of TOWERUP company.

featuresSection.subtitle: Building the future together
featuresSection.title: Realize your dreams with Tower Up
featuresSection.description: From design to project delivery — we provide a full cycle of construction work with quality guarantee and on time

projectsSection.sectionHeading: Innovative projects designed for the future
projectsSection.sectionDescription: Explore our signature projects that we create using modern technologies and uncompromising quality standards.

newUzbekistan.description: Modern complex with innovative architecture, green areas and developed infrastructure.

kumaryk.title: Residential Complex "Kumaryk"
kumaryk.description: Resort complex consisting of a 5* hotel and apartments with panoramic sea views and a private beach.

projectAdvantages.title: Advantages of RC "Pushkin"
projectAdvantages.description: Residential complex "Pushkin" is a standard of modern comfortable housing, combining convenient location, quality construction and care for future residents.

nearby.title: Everything you need - nearby
nearby.description: School, kindergarten, green area, playgrounds and clinic within walking distance.

parking.title: Convenient parking
parking.description: Multi-level above-ground parking for residents of the complex and their guests.

installment.title: 0% installment up to 2 years
installment.description: The most favorable conditions for purchasing real estate in our complex.

metro.title: 4 minutes from metro
metro.description: The 10th Station metro is just a short walk away, providing quick access to the city center.
